concept.title: Modifying Cache Contents
concept.shortdesc: To modify the cache based on information retrieved through querying, retrieve the entry keys and use them in the standard entry update methods.

conbody.p: The query service is a data access tool, so it does not provide any cache update functionality.
The next example shows entry key retrieval.

example.title: Get distinct entry keys and positions from active portfolios with at least a $25.00 market value
example.p: In the following example, retrieving the entry keys allows you to access the cached region entries for update. You cannot update the cache through the query engine.
example.codeblock:
Query string: SELECT DISTINCT key, posnVal FROM /portfolios.entrySet, value.positions.values posnVal TYPE Position WHERE posnVal.mktValue >= 25.00
Results: A SelectResults of Struct instances containing key, Position pairs.
